climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects. USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: SAY YES TO VEGAN D3: Our Organic Liquid D3 Spray contains 100% Plant Based and Certified Vegan vitamin D3 from Lichen (no lanolin); One spray delivers 1,000 IU of D3―250% of the Daily Value―or if you'd like, take 5 sprays for 5000 IU of vitamin D

IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT THAT SHINES: Our Organic Vitamin D supplement promotes calcium absorption for healthy bones and supports immune system function with Vitashine, Vegan Certified vitamin D as cholecalciferol; No lanolin or animal-derived ingredients

D3 WE FOUND YOUR PERFECT MATCH: What better way to deliver fat-soluble vitamin D3 than with plant omegas; Our D3 vitamin includes a Certified Organic omega-rich blend of Pumpkin and Cranberry Seed Oils which deliver 4mg of Omega-3 fatty acids per serving

HELLO LIQUID SUNSHINE: Why take D3 softgels or gummies made with sugar when you can one spray and be done? This liquid vitamin D3 comes in a delicious Vanilla flavor and is only sweetened with a little Stevia―no sugar, artificial flavors or sweeteners

VEGAN FRIENDLY D3 VITAMIN: Our Whole Food D3 Spray for adults is real to the root—tested at every step and Third Party Certified—so you don’t have to settle for less than Vegan, Organic, Non GMO Project Verified, Gluten Free, Kosher & Carbon Neutral
body.description: Garden of Life Organics Vegan D3… ORGANIC SUNSHINE. The biggest innovation in vitamins in over a decade. Made from real, nutritious food - not lanolin (cholesterol stripped from sheep's wool) - Organic Vegan D3 is the FIRST Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified Vegan D3 and is offered in a delicious vanilla flavored spray! This liquid vitamin D is Certified Vegan and Gluten Free and has no synthetic binders or fillers. It contains plant based D3 from lichen (as cholecalciferol - not lanolin) and Organic plant omegas (Organic Pumpkin Seed and Cranberry Seed Oils), delivering 1,000 IU (25mcg) of vitamin D. D3 promotes Calcium absorption for healthy bones and supports immune function.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We want the best when it comes to our food. Why would we want anything different for our vitamins and supplements? We are fanatical about food. We’re different that way. Whether we’re making a vitamin, or a probiotic, or a protein powder, we always start with real foods and these (foods) provide our formulas the power to be their best. We’re different that way, too. The synthetically created, chemical “breakthroughs” from huge commercial laboratories around the world are not for us. As fanatical as we are over what goes into our products, we are even more obsessed about the things we keep out of them. We hate those synthetic chemicals that most companies use to make their products. This stuff makes machines work faster, and helps factories churn out super-sized containers at higher “efficiency.” We’re uncompromising about your health. Slow it down, make it by hand, grow it in rich soil with enough sun, air, water and time for it to be its best. Harvest it when ready. Treat it with care. Turn it into a power-packed nutritious food supplement. That’s what we are about.

The Science of Whole Food Your body was created to eat, process, and derive its nutrition from food—real, healthy food. So, when we create our products, we start by looking at food. What is the “good stuff” in quality food that we are missing in our diets? Which of those foods have the greatest potential to impact—and empower—extraordinary health? Clean is healthy We start with what goes IN our products—true, whole food ingredients. But we don’t stop there. We also pay very close attention to what we keep OUT of them. And once again, we look at food—real nutrition food. When is the last time you picked up an apple, turned to read the ingredients, and saw a list of chemicals? If it’s not in your food, then we don’t want it in our supplements. Traceability Traceability is key to what makes Garden of Life’s products so special. Traceability starts with knowing where each and every ingredient in our products comes from and getting to know each and every source: where it’s grown; the farming practices; how they pay and treat the farm workers—everything. That’s why it’s so important to start with fruits and vegetables that are grown without these chemicals. We want to get the good stuff from foods that are grown without any of the bad stuff.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I love getting my vitamins in a way that will absorb quickly. This spray is super convenient. The taste is a bit strong (vanilla) but it goes away quickly. I usually spray it in an ounce of juice or so and it actually tastes great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this Vitamin D spray because it tastes great and really boosts my levels. It is very convenient and lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Vitamin D Spray Taste Like Birthday Cake
reviews.reviewText: Did not expect this vitamin D spray to taste good, but no joke this spray taste like fruity birthday cake. Yummm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great brand but tastes funny
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand. My husband likes the taste of this and I do not. That is the only reason it is missing a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to take
reviews.reviewText: The pump makes it easy, and I like taking vitamin D this way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This vitamin spray is so delicious I was actually surprised. I can tell it’s working. It makes it so much easier to wake in the morning and my nails are growing, which normally never happens in winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vitamin D Is Critical
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tastes weird but easy to take
reviews.reviewText: I have long been low in vitamin D. I love this company's vitamin B12, so I bought this one with high hopes. The flavor and consistency is not great compared to the vitamin B12. I can tolerate the flavor, but I don't think I'll be buying this one again. I also got tested a month after taking this daily, and my D levels were still low. My body doesn't absorb things well, but my vitamin B12 was normal (and I'm taking liquid B12 for that deficiency). I'm going to look for a different liquid vitamin D.

reviews.reviewTitle: ポンプ式でそのまま飲めるので、使いやすい。
reviews.reviewText: コロナとかインフルエンザの流行で、ピリピリしてるとき、手軽に飲めるので気に入ってる。錠剤で胃が痛くなることがないので、いい。ほかの液体ポンプのDよりいい。味もいいし、効き方もいい気がする。
